DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis cradle cap Must least 30 day old Must good health determine investigator Naive prior cradle cap therapy ( may use mineral , olive oil ) Known food , topical product medicinal allergy . Prior use corticosteroid , antifungal keratolytics Cradle Cap Weighing le 7 lb
